thread.title: Sam Faiers covers up as she breastfeeds baby Paul during trip to LA beach with partner Paul Knightley
thread.title_full: Sam Faiers covers up as she breastfeeds baby Paul during trip to LA beach with partner Paul Knightley

author: JJ Nattrass
title: Sam Faiers covers up as she breastfeeds baby Paul during trip to LA beach with partner Paul Knightley
text:
Celebs Sam Faiers covers up as she breastfeeds baby Paul during trip to LA beach with partner Paul Knightley The Mummy Diaries star, 26, made sure her son's mealtime was kept as private as possible on Venice Beach Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
The first series of her hit reality show, The Mummy Diaries, gave viewers an insight into her life as a first-time mother. 
But Sam Faiers ensured that both she and her baby, Paul, had some privacy on Friday in Venice Beach, Los Angeles when it was time for his feed. 
Taking care to wrap a blanket around herself and her son, the 26-year-old former TOWIE ensured that her breast wasn't visible to any other visitors frequenting the famous shoreline. 
Sam Faiers and family fly off to Los Angeles with camera crews following their every move Sam Faiers gave baby Paul some privacy during his feed (Photo: FameFlynet UK) 
Heading for a day out in the balmy and sunny climes of LA, Sam was the picture of a doting mother as she cared for her 14-month-old son. 
Placing a blanket carefully over her torso as she held Paul on her knee, the former Towie star ensured that her little boy (and herself enjoyed some measure of privacy). 
Accompanying Sam and Paul to the beach was her partner Paul Knightley, who perched next to Sam as she fed their son. Read More The TOWIE star, 26, wrapped a blanket around her baby as she they took a quick break on Venice Beach (Photo: FameFlynet UK) Her partner Paul Knightley was a comforting and protective presence (Photo: FameFlynet UK) 
As Paul placed a tender yet protective arm around the reality star, Sam leaned in and planted a kiss on her beau's lips. 
After a short stop to feed baby Paul, the couple looked to be ready to treat their tot to an action-packed family day out. 
Renting a tandem bicycle, the couple put on a sweet display as they peddled baby Paul about the beach. Read More The couple were treating their son to a fun-filled day at the beach in California (Photo: FameFlynet UK) Sam and her family fit right in with the West Coast vibe (Photo: FameFlynet UK) 
But despite the laid-back nature of the day, Sam still managed to look every inch the budding LA player, as she oozed a casual West Coast style. 
Opting for a preppy approach to athleisure, the Essex girl flaunted her lithe and tanned legs in a pair of thigh-skimming white shorts which she teamed with a pair of trainers. 
Adding a wintry but very causal edge to her look, the ITVBE star threw on a baggy teal jumper to keep the sea breeze at bay. She went for a causal athleisure look (Photo: FameFlynet UK) And her adorable son followed suit (Photo: FameFlynet UK) Paul and Sam are said to be eyeing up a possible move to LA (Photo: FameFlynet UK) 
Adding a touch of timeless LA glam to her look, Sam acccessorised her look with a pair of aviator shades. 
Meanwhile, Paul went for a similar athleisure look, but dressed down all in black. 
The couple and their baby boy flew into Los Angeles on Wednesday , and are rumoured to be in California scoping out the possibility of a move to the States - following the revelation they were keen to quit Essex and the UK last year. Like us on Facebook
